data.title: Industry Leader of Commercial Plumbing & Drainage Solutions
data.meta_description: Since 1926, Jay R. Smith Mfg. Co. has remained the industry leader in the design and manufacture of innovative plumbing and drainage products. Designed for maximum performance efficiency, durability, ease of installation and conformance to code, Smith products are “Brands Built to Last”!
